Industrial Applications

Industrial Control Terminal Wire

Reliable wire assemblies for PLCs, industrial automation, motor controls, and factory equipment. Built to withstand harsh industrial environments with vibration resistance and secure locking.

Industrial Control Applications

PLC Systems

Programmable logic controller I/O modules, power supply connections, and expansion cables.

Sensor & Actuator Wiring

Proximity sensors, limit switches, solenoid valves, and actuator cable assemblies.

Motor Control

VFD connections, servo motor cables, encoder feedback assemblies.

HMI Interfaces

Human-machine interface panels, touch screen connections, operator station wiring.

Control Cabinets

Internal cabinet wiring, inter-module connections, power distribution assemblies.

Industrial Automation

Robotic arm cables, conveyor system wiring, automated assembly machine interconnects.

Built for Industrial Environments

✓ Vibration Resistant

Positive lock connectors and strain relief prevent connection failures in high-vibration machinery environments.

✓ Secure Locking

XH series positive lock and EH series ejector designs ensure connections stay secure during operation.

✓ Temperature Tolerance

Rated for -25°C to +85°C operation with materials resistant to industrial temperature extremes.

✓ Chemical Resistance

PA66 and PBT housings resist common industrial chemicals, oils, and cleaning solvents.

✓ Tool-Free Disconnect

EH series ejector headers allow quick connector changes without tools during maintenance.

✓ Current Capacity

2-3A ratings suitable for industrial sensor and actuator power requirements.

Preferred Industrial Connector Series

JST XH Series

2.5mm pitch with positive lock. Most common for industrial control applications.

  • • 2-15 positions available
  • • 250V 3A rating
  • • Positive locking

JST EH Series

2.5mm pitch with ejector. Ideal for frequent maintenance and connector changes.

  • • 2-15 positions available
  • • 250V 3A rating
  • • Tool-free disconnect

Molex Micro-Fit

3.0mm pitch higher power capacity. For power-intensive industrial applications.

  • • 2-12 circuits available
  • • Up to 5A per circuit
  • • Secure locking

Industrial Project Examples

PLC I/O Module Cable Assembly

32-position breakout cable connecting PLC rack to remote I/O modules. XH series connectors with positive lock for vibration resistance.

XH Series 32-Position Shielded Available

Sensor Junction Box Wiring

Multi-branch wire loom with 8 sensor connection points. IP67-rated connectors for harsh industrial environments.

IP67 8-Port

VFD Control Cable Assembly

Variable frequency drive interface cable with integrated control and power conductors. Custom lengths for equipment installation.

Custom Length Multi-Conductor

From prototype to production, we deliver terminal wire solutions engineered for industrial control applications.
